SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.util

Class LineUtil

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.util.LineUtil
public final class LineUtil extends Object
Provides low-level line and stroke rendering helpers.

Handles drawing between points, calculating stroke intersections, and general line geometry for canvas operations.

  • Method Details

    • roundLineCap

      public static void roundLineCap(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, double currentWidth, double x, double y)
      Caps off lines with a circle.
      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext to draw on
      currentWidth - the diameter of the circle (usually stroke width)
      x - the x-coordinate of the circle’s center
      y - the y-coordinate of the circle’s center

    • drawLineWithCircles

      public static void drawLineWithCircles(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, double currentWidth, double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1)
      Draws a line between two points by stamping circles along the path. This technique creates smoother and more consistent line thickness compared to relying on the graphics context’s built-in stroke line.
      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext to draw on
      currentWidth - the thickness of the line
      x0 - the starting x-coordinate
      y0 - the starting y-coordinate
      x1 - the ending x-coordinate
      y1 - the ending y-coordinate
